description: This Kotlin source file defines a composable screen for displaying device details in a smart home TV dashboard. It uses Jetpack Compose to build a UI that shows device information, status, and controls such as toggles, adjustments, and navigation, with styling suited for a TV interface.

methods.name: DeviceDetailScreen
methods.description: Main composable function rendering the device detail screen with controls based on device type.

methods.name: StatusPill
methods.description: Private composable that displays a styled status indicator for the device.

methods.name: FocusableOutlinedGoldButton
methods.description: Styled outlined button for back navigation.

methods.name: FocusableActionButton
methods.description: Styled action button used for device controls like toggle, increase/decrease temperature, etc.
